law.catch_line: Specific contents of agent's and consultant's licenses.

text.section: The license of an agent shall not specify the name of any particular insurer by which the licensee is appointed as agent and the licensee may represent as an agent under the one (1) license as many insurers as may appoint the agent in accordance with this subtitle.
The license of a consultant shall show whether the license is for a "property and casualty consultant" or a "life and health consultant."

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 273, sec. 22, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 18, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 9, sec. 21, effective June 18, 1970.
